name: electron-ipc-methods
description: IPC via method calls in Electron
author: Joseph T. Lapp <arachnojoe@gmail.com>

scripts.test: tsc && shx cp test/client/dummy.html build/test/client && node_modules/.bin/rollup -c && ./test/run-tests
scripts.pub: tsc && cd build/src && rm *.map && yarn publish && cd ../..
